title: OxcOOOOO5?
body:
i get an error code that is above and i dont know why. it stops me from going into any games and makes me get lbs, lose ip and so on. HOWEVER it comes up and goes away at random
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: This specific error code typically means your network is having a hard time getting a solid connection with our servers. After seeing this and getting disconnected a few times, it's probably a good idea to take a step back and do some troubleshooting before ending up with punishments like that LPQ. Take some time to go over the steps outlined in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) making sure to reconfigure your port forwarding and DNS settings.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=tRtWUbEv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-09-19T02:54:49.885+0000)
>
> This specific error code typically means your network is having a hard time getting a solid connection with our servers. After seeing this and getting disconnected a few times, it's probably a good idea to take a step back and do some troubleshooting before ending up with punishments like that LPQ. Take some time to go over the steps outlined in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) making sure to reconfigure your port forwarding and DNS settings.

on a side note: i should be getting a new pc in like 2 weeks so if its my pc then ya. also about to buy rp casue singed skins ;-;
Send a ticket to [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and they can better help you on why this could be happening.
aye the one i just got gave me an LB SO THATS FUN
